entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -34.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -38.6°C
Wind: N 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 59 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
